title: Circle of the Land
content: de an attack, one of the duplicates disappears.10 turns Misty Step Lv 2 (Circle of the Land Only) Conjuration Bonus ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.Range: 18m Moonbeam Lv 2 Evocation ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot 2d10 RadiantCall down a silvery beam ofpale light that damages any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn in the light.You can use an action to move the beam 18m.10 turnsRange: 18mRadius: 1mCON SaveConcentration Pa
